definition: contrary/opposite/backwards/to go against/to oppose/to betray/to rebel

sentences.english: The fire proves gold, adversity brave men.
Trials and adversity can be prepatory to a new life.
sentences.chinese: 考验和逆境是新生的准备。

sentences.english: " he asked his daughter. "When adversity knocks on your door, how do you respond?
sentences.chinese: 他问女儿，“当逆境找上门来时，你该如何反应呢？

sentences.english: Fire is the test of gold, adversity of strong man .
sentences.chinese: 烈火试真金，逆境炼壮士。

sentences.english: The fungi can also increase their hosts tolerance to drought and other soil stresses.
sentences.chinese: 真菌也能提高寄主植物对干旱和其它逆境的忍耐能力。

sentences.english: Hardship disposes man to meet adversity.
as fire tries gold, so does adversity try virtue.
sentences.chinese: 正如烈火试炼真金，逆境试炼人的美德。

sentences.english: Adversity is followed by success and rejoicings follow woe.
sentences.chinese: 逆境之后便是成功，欢乐跟随着悲痛。

sentences.english: Be generous in prosperity and thankful in adversity.
sentences.chinese: 富足时须慷慨，逆境中要感恩。

sentences.english: Consistency and calmness in adversity are characteristics that most people will perceive as confidence.
sentences.chinese: 在逆境中保持一致与冷静就是能让大多数人感知自信。

sentences.english: Together, you triumphed resoundingly over this rare adversity.
sentences.chinese: 团结到一起来，你们克服逆境取得了胜利。

sentences.english: The mercy of God like unfaded cloth, although that was rinsed by adversities but still remain its bright colour.
sentences.chinese: 上帝的爱像不褪色的布料，被逆境冲洗，仍色彩绚丽。

sentences.english: A well-prepared mind hopes in adversity, and fears in prosperity.
sentences.chinese: 遇事有准备的人逢逆境不失望，处顺境不大意。

sentences.english: He was faithful to me in weal and woe.
sentences.chinese: 无论在顺境逆境，他一直对我忠诚。
得意时露瑕疵，逆境中见品质。

sentences.english: To ignore adversity is to yield to the ultimate self-delusion.
sentences.chinese: 忽视逆境其实就是在欺骗自己。
